value: gaslighting fascinates me gas lighting
and cognitive dissonance well you know
what was just happening I was packing
I dropped a pot of blue paint bright
bright blue and it fell and splashed all
over my carpet so I've been spending the
last couple of hours getting blue paint
out of the carpet of the place I have to
move from in a couple of weeks so as I
was cleaning up this stain I had the
time to think about gas lighting gas
lighting if I could define it is the act
of coercing someone out of the belief in
the evidence they have gathered the
evidence of their own senses and
experience I think when we are gas
lighted the stress comes from the fact
that we have formed an opinion or belief
or even a knowledge of something based
on our direct experience and yet somehow
there is a person or a number of people
or a whole system that is putting
pressure on us through various means to
discard the evidence of our own senses
in favor of the story they're telling
maybe this is not groundbreaking to
anyone but it all of a sudden came clear
to me because I think about gas lighting
and sometimes I'm like well it's really
it's really not that much different from
just lying or pulling a Colin on someone
and it definitely it it is that but why
is it special why does it have this
special category and why does it cause
us so much stress why is it so important
to emotional and psychological abuse and
you know the reason I started thinking
about gas lighting all over again is
because I was on the phone with the
hydro provider here and also at the same
time there was threat of a postal strike
we didn't know if the postal workers
were going to go on strike
anyway so I'm on the phone I'm on the
automated Bs robot part of phoning into
any of these agencies you know press 1
for this press 4 for this whatever and
it made me sit through the longest
announcement ever at the beginning about
this postal strike that may happen and
it they use the phrase this new phrase
in order to better serve our customers
so in this case Hite Ontario hydros big
long message to their customers while
they had them captive on hold was in
order to better serve our customers
during the upcoming Canada Post labor
action we ask that you go online and pay

to better serve the customers right no
that is in order to better serve the

get on the computer and find hydro one
and create an account and look up their
bill and set up their credit card for
payment and yadda yadda and they don't
want to in some ways it's psychological
abuse because especially since there are
hundreds of these types of overt
gaslighting attempts on us every day but
how they're constantly telling us that
there's no inflation and yet we know we
go to the store to buy groceries and
they're all much more expensive or they
hide the inflation by just making the
package is smaller and keep the price
the same we know our gas bills are
higher we know our insurance bills are
higher everything we can't escape paying
we know it costs more and they're like
bla bla bla
there's no inflation and that's because
they have a whole other way of
calculating inflation which has to do
with the money supply to me that's gas
lading I mean it requires very
specialised knowledge to to see through
but but they know that economists by and
large are not the ones watching the news
for this they know their audience and
they know how to manipulate their
audience this stuff happens over and
over in order to better serve our
customers we are reducing our our
this causes the cognitive dissonance in
our heads which makes us feel stressed
we can't resolve why the evidence in
front of our faces and the things we
know that are true and the things we
really experience we can't resolve why
the message is coming back from all the
authorities seem to contradict that
makes us stressed and that is the
essence of gaslighting is to put that
pressure that stress so that the person
in order to be more comfortable or just
to go along to get along has to keep
choosing something that goes against the
evidence that is right before their very

the blue paint led to the whole thing so
